Foam
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 15 - Caution: flammable. Keep your body away from fire or flames after you have put on the medicine

Excipients

May contain

Butylated hydroxytoluene, cetostearyl alcohol (including cetyl and stearyl alcohol), polysorbates

Regaine for men extra strength foam

Minoxidil 50 mg per 1 gram

  • 180 gram P

    NHS indicative price = £46.83

MINOXIDIL
